mapper.select: SELECT likecp.likecp_boolean likecpBoolean, likecp.likecp_no likecpNo, likecp.cpmember_id cpmemberId, likecp.member_id memberId, likecp.likecp_date likecpDate, hire.cpmember_id cpmemberId, hire.hire_announcement_no hireAnnouncementNo, hire.hire_announcement_title hireAnnouncementTitle, cp.cpmember_company cpmemberCompany, cp.cpmember_id cpmemberId, hire.hire_announcement_start_date hireAnnouncementStartDate , hire.hire_announcement_end_date hireAnnouncementEndDate FROM linkjobs_likecp likecp INNER JOIN linkjobs_hire_announcement hire ON likecp.cpmember_id = hire.cpmember_id INNER JOIN linkjobs_cpmember cp ON likecp.cpmember_id = cp.cpmember_id WHERE likecp.member_id = #{memberId} AND likecp.likecp_boolean ='Y' GROUP BY cp.cpmember_company

SELECT likecp_boolean likecpBoolean, likecp_no likecpNo, likecp_date likecpDate FROM linkjobs_likecp
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO linkjobs_likecp( member_id, cpmember_id, likecp_boolean, likecp_date ) VALUES ( #{memberId}, #{cpmemberId}, #{likecpBoolean}, NOW() )
